title: Deleted iPhone Photos are Restored in 3 Easy Steps
text: Deleted iPhone Photos are Restored in 3 Easy Steps , 12 September 2015 -- The release of GlobalShareware’s iFoneMate iPhone Data Recovery software is making a difference in the lives of those who have lost photos from their mobile device.Austin, TX – The release of GlobalShareware’s iFoneMate iPhone Data Recovery software is making a difference in the lives of those who have lost photos from their mobile device. The software allows anyone to restore their important iPhone photos in just three easy steps and it can be accomplished through three different methods. From selfies to major moments, taking photos is one of the most popular uses of the iPhone, but images can be deleted by accident, viruses, improper operation or damage to the phone. A stolen phone, failed sync or even the simple act of replacing the battery can result in photo loss. Copy errors, disk formatting problems, software malfunction, jailbreaking and media corruption are also common causes. iFoneMate enables individuals to recover and restore any of their photos and GlobalShareware is offering iPhone users the opportunity to download and try the software for free before they purchase. Images can be recovered to computers or other devices the user designates and versions are available for Mac and Windows systems. iFoneMate iPhone Data Recovery restores images, videos and photo streams on the iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch. The software works with the iPhone 4 and iOS 7.0 or below. It supports theiPhone 5, 5S and 5C;the iPod Touch 4 and 5; and the iPad 2, iPad Air and iPad mini with retina display. iPhone photos can be retrieved through three restoration modes from iTunes Backup, iOS device and iCloud Backup in three easy steps. Users find the missing images from one of the available sources, preview the data, and recover the photos as if they were never missing. To ensure success, GlobalShareware provides an easy to follow step-by-step online guide and 24/7 service support. The software is designed for easy use by even the most inexperienced iPhone users and requires only a few minutes to restore photos to devices. The release of GlobalShareware’s iFoneMate iPhone Data Recovery provides a safe and professional way to restore photos lost through a comprehensive array of causes. There’s no need for users to panic if those all-important photos are lost. iFoneMate provides individuals with a fast and effective way to restore iPhone photos in three easy steps. About GlobalShareware Established in 2002, GlobalShareware is an international platform devoted to providing multimedia software that seamlessly supports all iOS devices.
